New Records: Harry Kane scored a header in extra time to give England a 2-1 lead over Slovakia.
Jude Bellingham scored a bicycle kick in stoppage time to equalize the match and send it into extra time.
Key Match Events: The match went into extra time after Jude Bellingham's equalizer.
Harry Kane scored the winning goal for England in extra time.
Declan Rice had two attempts on goal that missed, including one that hit the post.
Slovakia took an early lead with a goal by Ivan Schranz in the 25th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: England was favored to win the match with odds of +350.
The match was part of the UEFA Euro 2024 tournament, with England ranked 9th in the power rankings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The live coverage ended after the match, with no additional updates.
